text: Keerthanam is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Venu B. Nair, starring Mukesh and Pragathi in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/keerthanam- malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Mukesh as Josekutty * Pragathi as Susanna * Innocent as Mathukutty * KPAC Lalitha as Carmili, Mathukutty's sister * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Carmili's husband * Harisree Ashokan as Paappi * Philomina as Ammachi *K. P. Ummer as Father Pulikkottil *Kunchan as Uslampetti Chettiyar *Zainuddin as Velli Vareed *Rajan P. Dev as Kariya *Idavela Babu as Peter, Kariya's son *Kalabhavan Narayanankutty *Paravoor Bharathan *Shammi Thilakan as Sunny *Mala Aravindan as Pushkaran *Kanakalatha as Kariya's wife *K. T. S. Padannayil as Sulthan *Thrissur Elsy as Nun *N. L. Balakrishnan as Vedimaram Chacko *Keerthi Gopinath as Kariya's daughter *Usha as Alamelu *Kalabhavan Santhosh ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Keerthanam
